episode_id: SW - #036 - 2019-05-24 - The Problem with Monotheism - Santa and the Tooth Fairy Pt. 2
speaker: Jonathan Pageau
text: On this episode of the Symbolic World podcast, I start to explore some of the ideas of principalities. A lot of the notion of what principalities are, angels, demons, all these ancient ideas of beings that exist above us or that control the world to some extent or have influence on the world, is something that is very difficult for people to understand. And so, riding on the coattails of the Santa Claus and Tooth Fairy discussion that we had last time, I look at how principalities exist and how when we talk about Christianity in terms of a monotheism, in terms of having only one God, we run the risk of deluding ourselves in not understanding that although we do believe that God is one, that there are also necessarily a hierarchy of principalities which govern the world and which engage with the world. And so I hope that it is a difficult subject to talk about, especially to modern listeners, but I hopefully it will be enlightening for you.

speaker: Jonathan Pageau
text: So please enjoy.
